Detailed Description

CPuzzleSpanArtist.

Description: This class is responsible for painting spans to the canvas on the screen.

Limitations: None

int  fromNode
) 
 

CPuzzleSpanArtist::paintMask.

Description: This function paints the given span's edges originating from the given node into a pixmap for hit detection on edges in the graph.

Precondition:
None
Postcondition:
None
Parameters:
span,: This is a pointer to the span to be painted.
fromNode,: This is the number of the node within the span (valid values should be 1 or 2).
Limitations: NOT WORKING YET

Precondition:
None
Postcondition:
The given span is painted to the screen.
Parameters:
